Attacks.Name: Scratch
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Nidorina gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Poison Fang
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Poison special condition.

Attacks.Name: Double Kick
Attacks.Effect: This attack can be made twice in the same action. The second attack must target the same character.

Superpowers.Name: Poison Point
Superpowers.Effect: When Nidorina is targeted by a physical attack and the attacker rolls a wild, the attacking character gains the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Protective Instinct
Superpowers.Effect: Nidorina may reroll one defense die when targeted by an attack if an allied character is within Range 2.

Attacks.Name: Venom Crush
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Stagger and Poison special conditions.

Superpowers.Name: Venomous Burst
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 of Nidorina suffer 1 damage and gain the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Nidoqueen character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
